title: How to Clear the Router History

steps.title: Open an internet browser on your computer.
steps.content: Open an internet browser on your computer. You can use any browser, such as Firefox, Chrome, Safari, or Opera.

steps.title: Enter your router's IP address into the address bar.
steps.content: Enter your router's IP address into the address bar. Click the address bar at the top of your browser, and type your router’s default IP address. [1] X Research source Most routers use 192.168.0.1 as the default IP address. If it doesn't work for you, you can try 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.2.1 . If none of these IP addresses work, try restarting your router or disconnecting it from internet.

steps.title: Enter your router’s admin username and password.
steps.content: Enter your router’s admin username and password. [2] X Expert Source Mitch Harris Consumer Technology Expert Expert Interview. 31 August 31 2021. This will allow you to log in to your router’s admin interface.

steps.title: Click the Login button.
steps.content: Click the Login button. This will log you into the router’s admin interface. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Status tab on the navigation bar.
steps.content: Click the Status tab on the navigation bar. Find the Status button on the navigation bar in your router’s admin interface, and click it. Depending on your router’s model, this button may also be labeled Advanced or another similar name. [4] X Research source For most routers, you can find the navigation bar at the top of the page or at the left-hand side of the screen.

steps.title: Click System Log or Administration-Event Log on the navigation bar.
steps.content: Click System Log or Administration-Event Log on the navigation bar. This button will open your router’s system log on a new page. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Clear Log button.
steps.content: Click the Clear Log button. This button will clear your router's system log history. [6] X Research source If you’re prompted to confirm your action in a pop-up, click OK or Yes .
